Posts.Content: mom2daughters wrote: Hi, just started tc last week.  Will have 4 rounds.  Did everyone lose their hair, or did anyone just have thinning.  I have very thick hair and I was told that I might just have  thinning.  Was the nurse  just trying to make me feel better?  Just curious. Also, when did it start to grow back.  thanks - k Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Taxotere and Cytoxan - hair loss mom2daughters Harley44
